Key Match Events: Daniel Gafford exited the game against the Memphis Grizzlies in visible pain due to a left ankle sprain
Pre-Game Insights: Injuries continue to pile up for Jason Kidd's team, with Gafford joining an already growing list of sidelined players. Superstars Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving are also out, further complicating matters for Dallas.
Post-Match Reflections: Dallas Mavericks coach Jason Kidd addressed Kyrie Irving's latest injury setback and the report suggesting that Irving will be sidelined for at least one to two weeks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gafford's night was cut short after logging just eight minutes off the bench. He finished with five points on 2-of-3 shooting from the field, along with one rebound and one block.
Others: The Mavericks are scheduled to play on a second night of a back-to-back against the Lakers on Tuesday.
